Ever hear a gurgling noise around your drains? Gurgling is a sign that your outward bound sewage line is becoming too narrow due to buildup in the pipes. When liquid tries to go through a narrowed pipe, the air is displaced and creates a "glub glub glub” noise. Time to get the lines cleaned before it turns into a blocked pipe, closed doors, and bad reviews! Call (806) 373-7866.
